version_description:
1) Major Spring Contents Update
- Spring themed dragons added
- Cherry blossom petal fall effect
- New quests from rare dragons
- New package items update
2) High level player contents added
- Highest player level lifted
- Magic castle upgrade and work numbers increased
3) New player contents strengthened
- Daily reward system for new players added
- Experience points booster item for faster level up added
4) Others
- VIP system strengthened
- Server speed upgraded
- Other bug fix

1) New dragons & buildings added
2) Other bug fix

1) Adorable new dragons & buildings added
2) Bugs have been fixed

1) Adorable new dragons & buildings added
2) Pop up that pops up as starting the app has been blocked
3) Bugs have been fixed

1) Adorable new dragons & buildings added
2) Exp. bar has been fixed
3) Other bugs have been fixed

1) Adorable new dragons & buildings added
2) critical Crash has been fixed
3) Other bugs have been fixed

1. Adorable Dragons and Buildings are added
2. TV box has been removed
3. Minor crashes have been fixed

1. A dragon welcomes new users
2. An icon to point Lucky Architecture is added
3. Magic show now tells you when you don't have friends to invite
4. Notice words will tell you when there is no friend to follow for the day
5. Maximum number of NPC has been fixed to 100
